dc:title: Having a Baby
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Chronological description of the birth of her child. The article became so popular that it was reprinted in other socialist periodicals even in Russia.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 30 1930-01-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
